title: Streaming on Twitch: Viewer Count With Muted Audio Explained

steps.title: Yes, you can earn Twitch Drops while the stream is muted.
steps.content: Yes, you can earn Twitch Drops while the stream is muted. To start building progress towards a Twitch Drop reward, you just need to have the stream open and playing live. The stream tab can be minimized and muted; you will still earn rewards. [1] X Research source To check your Twitch Drop progress, click your profile picture and select Drops & Rewards . You'll see a meter underneath the In Progress header. Keep in mind that watching VODs won't count for Twitch Drops; it must be a live stream.

steps.title: Viewer Count refers to anyone watching the stream.
steps.content: Viewer Count refers to anyone watching the stream. This doesn't necessarily mean they're connected to the chat. Anyone watching the live video, whether logged in or viewing as a guest, will count towards this number. When this viewer stops the stream or closes it, the number will drop and reflect this. [2] X Research source You will count as a viewer even if the stream is muted, if you have a different tab in focus, or if the Twitch app is minimized.

steps.title: Users in Chat refers to users connected to the stream's chat.
steps.content: Users in Chat refers to users connected to the stream's chat. This is separate from the Viewer Count because, while users need to be logged into their Twitch account, they don't need to be watching the stream to interact with the chat. They could have the chat popped out of the video interface or the video paused. Chat bots do not count towards Viewer Count since they don't actively watch the stream.

steps.title: Do I count as a viewer if the stream is open in another tab?
steps.content: Do I count as a viewer if the stream is open in another tab? As long as the stream is playing live, you will continue to count as a viewer until you close the tab.

steps.title: Will I count as a viewer if the stream is in the background (mobile)?
steps.content: Will I count as a viewer if the stream is in the background (mobile)? If you have the stream's live audio playing, you will count as a viewer even if the video itself is playing in the background.

steps.title: Can I mute the stream and still count as a viewer?
steps.content: Can I mute the stream and still count as a viewer? You can count as a viewer if you mute the stream as long as you have the live video actively playing. The tab can be active or in the background.

steps.title: How soon does the Viewer Count update?
steps.content: How soon does the Viewer Count update? Viewer Count will typically update within a few minutes.

steps.title: How soon does Users in Chat update?
steps.content: How soon does Users in Chat update? Users in Chat will also update within a few minutes, similar to Viewer Count.
